name: Academy
desc:
The Academy sponsors 3 items each game.

Copies of sponsored items grant bonus max Health and Damage Amp. Academy units holding sponsored items gain double the amount, plus an additional 5% Health and Damage Amp.
stats: 2% Health and Damage Amp, gain 1 sponsored item.
3% Health and Damage Amp, gain 1 sponsored item.
5% Health and Damage Amp, gain 1 sponsored item.

name: Emissary
desc: This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Emissaries.
stats:
Gain all bonuses. Emissaries gain 250 Health and 20% Damage Amp.

Ambessa: Allies gain 2 Armor and Magic Resist for each opponent defeated.

Garen: On Combat Start, Garen and allies to his left and right gain 20% of his max Health.

Nami: Allies' attacks grant 3 bonus Mana.

Tristana: Allies gain 6% Attack Speed per star level.

name: Ambusher
desc: Damage from Ambushers' Abilities can critically strike. They also gain bonus Critical Strike Chance and Critical Strike Damage.
stats: 55% Crit, 25% Crit Mult; also gain 15% Durability

name: Bruiser
desc: Your team gains 100 max Health. Bruisers gain more.

name: Black Rose
desc: Each Black Rose champion's star level increases Sion's power.
stats: Summon a chained Sion. He is freed after 5 casts from Black Rose units or when he drops below 65% health.
Sion grows stronger and his enemies take more damage from Black Rose units.
Sion unleashes dark magic and heals to full Health when freed.
When Sion dies, he restores to life with power beyond death!

name: Quickstriker
desc: Quickstrikers move faster and gain Attack Speed, based on their target's missing Health.
stats: 40-100% AS. On target death, Quickstrikers dash to a new target and gain 200 shield for 3 seconds.

name: Chem-Baron
desc:
Gain Shimmer after each player combat. If your loss streak is at least 3, gain more.

At each stack of 100 Shimmer, the Black Market offers you contraband that only Chem-Barons can use. Chem-Barons gain max Health for each Black Market you pass on.
stats: Per Combat 15 or loss streak 35; 20 Health
Per Combat 15 or loss streak 50; 60 Health
Per Combat 20 or loss streak 70; 100 Health
Per Combat 20 or loss streak 90; 150 Health

name: Experiment
desc:
Gain Laboratory hexes on your board.

Combat start: Experiments standing on Laboratory hexes gain the Experiment bonuses of all Experiments on Laboratory hexes, plus max Health.

name: Family
desc: Family members support each other, reducing their max Mana and gaining extra bonuses.
stats: 40% reduction, heist on topside! After combat, progress the heist, increased for each surviving family member!

name: Form Swapper
desc:
Innate: Form Swappers change their stats and ability based on if they're placed in the front 2 rows or back 2 rows.

Frontline Form Swappers gain Durability. Backline Form Swappers gain Damage Amp.

name: Automata
desc: Automata gain a crystal when they deal damage. At 20 crystals, they blast their current target, dealing magic damage + 25% of damage dealt since the previous blast and reset. They also gain Armor and Magic Resist.

name: Firelight
desc: Every 6 seconds, Firelights dash. While dashing, they attack with infinite range and heal a percentage of the damage taken since their last dash.
stats: 45% of damage taken. While dashing, gain a massive burst of Attack Speed.

name: Dominator
desc:
Combat start: Dominators gain a Shield for 15 seconds.

When Dominators cast, they gain stacking Ability Power based on the Mana spent.

name: Visionary
desc: Whenever Visionaries gain Mana, they gain more.
stats: 75% Mana, Abilities heal an ally for 16% of damage dealt

name: Artillerist
desc: Every 5 attacks, Artillerists launch a rocket that deals 125% Attack Damage around the target. They also gain Attack Damage.
stats: 70% AD, Launch a rocket every 3 attacks that deals double damage.

name: Pit Fighter
desc: Pit Fighters gain 15% Omnivamp and deal bonus true damage. Once per combat at 50% Health, they heal a percentage of their max Health over 2 seconds.

name: Rebel
desc:
Rebels gain 15% max Health.

After your team loses 25% of their Health, a smoke signal appears, granting Rebels 60% Attack Speed for 5 seconds and extra power for the rest of combat.
stats: 45% AD/AP, 15% Health, and Stun all enemies for 2 seconds
The smoke signal triggers at Combat Start and every 12 seconds.

name: Scrap
desc: Combat start: Components held by Scrap units temporarily turn into full items. Scrap units gain Shield for 24 seconds for each component held by your team, including those that make up a full item.
stats: All components, and full items become lucky! 45 Shield

name: Sniper
desc: Snipers deal more damage to targets farther away.
stats: Damage Amp 75%, 20% damage per hex and +5 Attack Range

name: Sorcerer
desc: Your team gains 10 Ability Power. Sorcerers gain more.
stats: 90 AP, Abilities reduce their target's damage by 20% for 3 seconds

name: Enforcer
desc:
Combat Start: Enforcers gain Shield and Damage Amp. The highest Health enemy units become WANTED!

When a Wanted enemy dies, Enforcers gain 30% Attack Speed.
stats: ALL enemies; 100% Health, 150% DA, Combat Start: Confiscate all enemy items!

name: Sentinel
desc: Your team gains Armor and Magic Resist. Sentinels gain triple.

name: Conqueror
desc:
Conquerors' takedowns grant stacks of Conquest. After gaining enough Conquest, open War Chests full of loot!

Conquerors gain Attack Damage and Ability Power, increased by 5% for each War Chest opened.

name: Watcher
desc: Watchers gain Durability, increased while above 50% Health.
